group_1.textLeft: Ayame...@I wonder if she'll come...

group_1.textRight: She will.
I'm sure she wants to talk to you, too.
Mm... Here she comes.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-wha...?!

group_1.textCenter: We'll leave you guys alone.@Later, Kako!

group_1.textLeft: O-okay...!

group_1.textRight: Kako...

group_1.textLeft: I'm so glad you're here, Ayame...!
I thought I might not see you today, so...

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh...

group_1.textLeft: Umm...so...I guess you're not feeling well...?

group_1.textRight: I'm sure...ya heard about us and Sae too, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: ...Ya don't gotta worry about it.

group_1.textLeft: It's not about that...@I'm worried about you, Ayame...

group_1.textRight: ...I dunno anythin' anymore...
I was...workin' as a buddyguard to@protect Magical Girls, but...
Sae...died, didn't she...

group_1.textLeft: Well...

group_1.textRight: We're...murderers, huh...

group_1.textLeft: That's not true!
You were all doing your best...and no one is@at fault...

group_1.textRight: ...But, if I were Sae, I'd think we're terrible...
We should probably stop bein' buddyguards...

group_1.textLeft: ...But...you've saved me so many times.
Like the other day, when I was attacked by@those Promised Blood girls...

group_1.textRight: But in the end, Konoha and Hazuki had to@come save me that time...

group_1.textLeft: But, you were the reason I survived.
Plus...ever since you started your@bodyguard work...
I know you've saved a lot of girls...
I'm very sorry about Sae Kirino...but...
I don't really think you should stop@being a bodyguard at this point...

group_1.textRight: But, I'm...scared...
I'm scared that I'll let someone else die 'cuz@I'm too weak...
...Since I started bein' a buddyguard...
I wanted to do somethin' cool for someone else.
I thought maybe when I grew up,@I could get a job helpin' people.
But...that's impossible for me...

group_1.textLeft: Why do you think that...?

group_1.textRight: 'Cuz I couldn't protect Sae...
I can't be a buddyguard who helps anyone...

group_1.textLeft: That's not true...!@Why don't you try one more time...?

group_1.textRight: ...It's fine.
I can still be together with Konoha and Hazuki.
If I can help you when you're in trouble...
I don't need to be a buddyguard anymore...

group_1.textLeft: ...Ayame...
